snippet.title: The Tome of All Tales - Early Access trailer
snippet.description:
The Tome of All Tales is a minimalist old-school shooter that offers a new story every day. Now available in early access!

To learn more, visit https://thetomeofalltales.com
Get the game on Itch.io: https://akaagar.itch.io/the-tome-of-all-tales
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/HV9kkVXYrU

Trailer music by PMSFX/ZapSplat.com
